Recipe: Crocolisk Steak
Requires Cooking (80)
Use: Teaches you how to cook a Crocolisk Steak.

Crocolisk Steak
Requires Level 5
Use: Restores 243 health over 21 sec. Must remain seated while eating. If you spend at least 10 seconds eating you will become well fed and gain 4 Stamina and Spirit for 15 min.

Requires Crocolisk Meat, Mild Spices

3868
Plans: Frost Tiger Blade
Requires Blacksmithing (200)
Use: Teaches you how to make a Frost Tiger Blade.

Frost Tiger Blade
Binds when equipped
Two-HandSword
78 - 118 DamageSpeed 3.40
(28.8 damage per second)
Requires Level 35
Equip: Improves your chance to get a critical strike with melee and ranged attacks by 1%.
Chance on hit: Launches a bolt of frost at the enemy causing 20 to 30 Frost damage and slowing movement speed by 50% for 5 sec.

Requires Steel Bar (8), Strong Flux (2), Heavy Grinding Stone (2), Jade (2), Frost Oil, Heavy Leather (4)

Belt of the Fang
Footpads of the Fang
Gloves of the Fang
Leggings of the Fang
Armor of the Fang
Shoulders of the Fang
(2) Set: Increases damage done by Nature spells and effects by up to 7.
(3) Set: Reduces your chance to be dodged or parried by 1%.
(4) Set: Increases healing done by up to 11 and damage done by up to 4 for all magical spells and effects.
(5) Set: +10 Intellect.
(6) Set: Your attacks have a chance to apply Deviate Poison, which causes the target to take up to 19 additional damage from spells.

12240
Recipe: Heavy Kodo Stew
Requires Cooking (200)
Use: Teaches you how to cook Heavy Kodo Stew.

Heavy Kodo Stew
Requires Level 35
Use: Restores 1392 health over 30 sec. Must remain seated while eating. If you spend at least 10 seconds eating you will become well fed and gain 12 Stamina and Spirit for 15 min.

Requires Heavy Kodo Meat (2), Soothing Spices, Refreshing Spring Water

22053
Deadly Poison VI
Classes: Rogue
Requires Level 62
Use: Coats a weapon with poison that lasts for 1 hour.\r
Each strike has a 30% chance of poisoning the enemy for 162 Nature damage over 12 sec. Stacks up to 5 times on a single target. Once stacked to 5 times, each application of Deadly Poison also causes the poison on the Rogue's other weapon to apply.

Classes: Rogue
Requires Level 70
Use: Coats a weapon with poison that lasts for 1 hour.\r

29528
Drums of War
Requires Leatherworking (325)
Use: Increases attack power by 60 and spell power by 30 on nearby party members. Lasts 30 sec. Cannot affect targets level 80 or higher.
29529
Drums of Battle
Requires Leatherworking (350)
Use: Increases haste rating on nearby party members by up to 80. Lasts 30 sec. Cannot affect targets level 80 or higher.
29530
Drums of Speed
Requires Leatherworking (340)
Use: Increases movement speed of nearby party members by 15%. Lasts 30 sec.
29531
Drums of Restoration
Requires Leatherworking (350)
Use: Restores 600 health and mana to nearby party members over 15 sec. Cannot affect targets level 80 or higher.
29532
Drums of Panic
Requires Leatherworking (350)
Use: Unearthly rhythms cause 5 enemies within 8 yds to flee in terror for 2 sec.

Major Glyph
Classes: Paladin
Requires Level 15
Use: Your Judgements deal 10% more damage.
41094
Glyph of Seal of Command
Major Glyph
Classes: Paladin
Requires Level 20
Use: You gain 8% of your base mana each time you use a Judgement with Seal of Command active.

Major Glyph
Classes: Paladin
Requires Level 15
Use: Increases your Hammer of Justice range by 5 yards.

Classes: Paladin
Requires Level 18

Requires Level 15

Requires Level 50

Use: Temporarily embed an armor kit onto your bracers, increasing your attack power by 10 for 1 hour. Only the leatherworker's bracers can be enchanted and embedding a bracer will cause it to become soulbound. (1 Sec Cooldown)
62191

Use: Temporarily embed an armor kit onto your bracers, increasing your stamina by 5 for 1 hour. Only the leatherworker's bracers can be enchanted and embedding a bracer will cause it to become soulbound. (1 Sec Cooldown)
